item.title: CVE-2024-31090|2024-03-31T19:27:37.254Z -- 荒野无灯 -- Hacklog Down As PDF
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in 荒野无灯 Hacklog Down As PDF allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Hacklog Down As PDF: from n/a through 2.3.6.
